name.en: Mystic Mystery of the White Forest
name.ja: <ruby>白<rt>しろ</rt></ruby>き<ruby>森<rt>もり</rt></ruby>の<ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>妖<rt>よう</rt></ruby>

text.en:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 2 "White Forest" monsters in your GY; place them face-up in their owners' Spell & Trap Zones as Continuous Spells. During your opponent's Main Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using this card you control. You can only use each effect of "Mystic Mystery of the White Forest" once per turn.
